comments.comments_text: A perfect lofted pass from Douglas Santos finds Claudinho (Zenit St Petersburg), who jumps highest and steers a close-range header to the middle in the countermovement of the keeper. His effort was both strong and precise, and Kepa Arrizabalaga had no chance of stopping that. 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Magomed Ozdoev (Zenit St Petersburg) gets to the ball on the edge of the box and fires in a first-time shot without any hesitation. The strike is excellent and goes straight into the top left corner. He couldn't have done it any better. 3:3.
